alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 11 at 2:10PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Gusty Winds, Blowing Snow and Low Wind Chill Values from Trims Camp South... North winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts near 50 mph will continue this evening and continue into Sunday south of Trims Camps along the Richardson Highway will produce blowing and drifting snow. the winds combined with cold temperatures will produce wind chill values of 30 to 50 below. The north winds will persist into Sunday before diminishing. Blowing snow may reduce visibility to one half mile or less at times, while drifting snow may impact travel through the area. Drivers should be prepared for difficult winter driving conditions and keep appropriate winter gear available. For the latest forecasts go to www.weather.gov/fairbanks.
